text: Andres Mauricio Caicedo Piedrahita (born ) is a Colombian male weightlifter, competing in the 77 kg category and representing Colombia at international competitions. He participated at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 77 kg event, finishing 6th. He competed at world championships, including at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships. Prior to the 2018 World Weightlifting Championships, Caicedo has been provisionally suspended for testing positive for the anabolic steroid, Boldenone. The IWF has posted nothing more regarding his suspension.
